meaning_str.bing:
n. 文化；栽培；养殖；培育
v. 培养（细胞或细菌）
网络. 企业文化；文明；教养

文化；文明；修养；养殖；培养；栽培；（细胞、细菌等的）培养物
培养（细菌、组织等）；栽培（植物）；养殖（动物）

sogou-CET6.n: 文化; 文明[出现53次)];(艺术/音乐/文学等)文化[出现9次)];文化方式[出现5次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 文化; 文明[出现24次)];(艺术/音乐/文学等)文化[出现13次)];文化方式[出现6次)]

1.en: It's easy to see why he did this. He was arguing against global elites who sometimes refuse to acknowledge the power of culture at all.
1.cn: 他这样做是很容易理解的，因为他反对是那些有时完全拒绝承认文化力量的全球精英。

2.en: In three one the headquarters of the company, with its leader born value system, set up to emphasize the culture.
2.cn: 在三一公司的总部，通过其领导人天生的价值体系，树立了强调努力工作的文化。

3.en: The heart appeared to BE of aortic type with a tortuous and prolonged aorta. Culture of the sputum showed growth of Streptococcus pneumonia.
3.cn: 心脏呈动脉型，主动脉曲屈延长。痰培养肺炎双球菌生长

0.en: It's about Mr. Spock and his impact on our culture.
0.cn: 主题是史波克先生及他对我们文化的影响。

1.en: Oh, I love museums. Soaking up all the culture. Yeah.
1.cn: 我好喜欢来博物馆，接受文化熏陶。是的。

2.en: Yes, our culture worshiped the aggressor throughout the ages.
2.cn: 对，许多世代以来，我们文化中对侵略过度崇拜。

3.en: Losing our culture, co-opting ourselves by becoming Lockhart, Florrick/Agos.
3.cn: 会失去我们的文化，得低头配合变成洛&福&艾律所。

4.en: This is a week to understand that culture isn't found at a souvenir shop. Riley, what's culture? Our stories.
4.cn: 这是理解文化不是在纪念品店就能找到的一周。莱丽，什么是文化？我们的故事。

5.en: Looking back to the past has long been a part of Chinese culture.
5.cn: 回首过去是中国文化由来已久的传统。

6.en: Yeah, to put some intelligence and culture to our brutal lives.
6.cn: 是啊，想要给我们这种粗人讲点文化知识。

7.en: Your respect for Chinese ways and culture is known to us, Prince.
7.cn: 我们了解您对中原文化和习俗的尊重，王子。

8.en: A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty, who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture, is wiped from existence!
8.cn: 克里国的疯子，对和平协定很不满，不把我们柴达文化消灭他绝不罢休。

9.en: She certainly has the symmetry and low body fat that western culture deems desirable.
9.cn: 她确实有着西方文化所青睐的既匀称而又低脂肪的身段。

10.en: All through Culture Week, I've been searching the school for the America booth. And they don't have one.
10.cn: 整个文化周我都在找美国摊位，但是并没有。

11.en: If there is one place that is the very soul of Beijing's food culture, this must be it.
11.cn: 如果有一个地方是北京饮食文化的灵魂，那一定就是这里。

12.en: That innovation is what made possible our modern consumer culture by enabling a low-unit cost for manufactured goods.
12.cn: 这项创新通过低成本的生产商品造就了现代消费文化。

13.en: Through this promotion of arts we can better understand the culture and civilizations of the other people.
13.cn: 通过对艺术的推广，我们能够更好地理解对方的文化与文明。

14.en: You shall attend my cousin Kaidu's feast tonight. I await your thoughts on a lesser culture.
14.cn: 你去参加今晚海都举办的宴会吧，我想听听你对我们这些略逊色文化的看法。

15.en: Well, I'm just trying to bring a little culture to the group. That's fine. Just don't bring it in my mouth.
15.cn: 我只是想介绍大家认识欧洲文化。只要不要介绍到我嘴里就好了。

16.en: Perception of disgust is a combination of variables like age, gender, culture and even personality.
16.cn: 大家对"恶心"的标准不太一样，这些跟年龄、性别、文化甚至是个性有关。

17.en: A billion people, with rich culture, amazing stories, and as a product of both those cultures, I want to help faster understanding between the two and help create that incredible relationship.
17.cn: 十几亿人口，丰富的文化，惊人的故事，作为东西两种文化的产物，我想帮助加速两者间的了解，帮助创造惊人的关系。

18.en: Why am I your enemy when you're the one prepared to bury our culture in history's potter's field?
18.cn: 为何对我怀有如此敌意？别忘了你才是那个要将我国文化掩埋于历史之墓的人。

19.en: Where? Who? Well, your great grandparents, they lived in San Francisco. They got to experience the Chinese culture.
19.cn: 哪里？都有谁？你的外曾祖父母，他们住在旧金山，体验过中国文化。
